Quotes

风向转变时,有人筑墙,有人造风车

(When the wind of change blows, some people build walls, others build windmills.)

You are never wrong to do the right thing

(Mark Twain, american writer, humorist, entrepreneur, publisher, lecturer - 1835/1910)

Everyone wants to be successful until they see what it actually takes

(Anonymous)

I was getting really good at being mediocre

(Anonymous)

I think I can safely say that nobody understands quantum mechanics.

(Richard Feynman, American theoretical physicist, Nobel Prize in Physics in 1965)
